Mad Hatters House.name: Mad Hatters House
Mad Hatters House.description: The Mad Hatter's house. It's a bit of a mess.

locations.name: Living Room
locations.descr: The Mad Hatter's cluttered living room. It's set up for a tea party.

Mad Hatter.name: Mad Hatter
Mad Hatter.title: Mad Hatter
Mad Hatter.personality: The Mad Hatter from Lewis Carrol's Alice in Wonderland. He is a bit crazy and has a strange sense of humor.
Mad Hatter.descr: Wearing a big hat and a colorful costume.
Mad Hatter.short_descr: A man with a big hat and colorful costume.

Duchess.name: Duchess
Duchess.title: Duchess
Duchess.personality: The Duchess from Lewis Carrol's Alice in Wonderland. Volatile and aggressive personality.
Duchess.descr: Very big head. Tall enough to rest her chin upon Aliceâ€™s shoulder, uncomfortably sharp chin.
Duchess.short_descr: Short woman with a very large head.

Ace of Spades.name: Ace of Spades
Ace of Spades.title: Ace of Spades
Ace of Spades.personality: A drunken ex-rock star. Like a talkative Ozzy Osbourne if he were in Alice in Wonderland.
Ace of Spades.descr: Thin man with eyeliner and a vacant expression. Wearing a black leather jacket and a black top hat.
Ace of Spades.short_descr: A man with leather jacket and a black top hat.
